channel.title: Satyori Way
channel.description:
Satyori Way brings you daily insights from Ayurveda, Jyotish (Vedic Astrology), and Classical Yoga philosophy. Each episode distills ancient wisdom into practical guidance for navigating modern life with greater awareness, balance, and purpose.
Hosted by the Satyori Way team, drawing from classical texts and traditional teachings to illuminate timeless principles for health, self-understanding, and spiritual growth.

item.title: Mars in Vedic Astrology: The Force Behind Action
item.description: Explore the fiery nature of Mars (Mangala) in Vedic Astrology - the planet of courage, action, and willpower. Learn how this warrior energy manifests in your chart and daily life.
